function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High attack rates and seroprevalence in the population","Impact":"Widespread transmission of contagious diseases, leading to illness and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Implement vaccination programs, social distancing measures, and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Vaccine development, contact tracing apps, air filtration systems","People":"General population, especially those at high risk","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Assumption of no waning immunity leading to higher estimates","Impact":"Overestimation of population immunity and potential for ongoing transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct regular seroprevalence studies to monitor immunity levels over time","Technologies":"Seroprevalence testing, antibody monitoring technology","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Estimation of high average national basic reproductive number (R0)","Impact":"Higher risk of rapid disease spread and difficulty in containment","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, contact tracing, and targeted lockdowns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, data analytics for monitoring transmission","People":"Public health officials, local authorities, general population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
